SEARCH
Package com.isblocks.pkcs11

Class CryptokiE

java.lang.Object
com.isblocks.pkcs11.CryptokiE
public class CryptokiE extends Object
Low-level non-static java interface that maps to NativeProvider cryptoki calls.

    • InitToken

      public void InitToken(long slotID, byte[] pin, byte[] label)
      Initialises a token. Pad or truncate label if required.
      Parameters:
      slotID - ID of the token's slot
      pin - the SO's initial PIN
      label - 32-byte token label (space padded). If not 32 bytes, then it will be padded or truncated as required
      See Also:

      public void OpenSession(long slotID, long flags, NativePointer application, CK_NOTIFY notify, LongRef session)
      Opens a session between an application and a token.

      session - gets session handle

      public void SignInit(long session, CKM mechanism, long key)

    • VerifyInit

      public void VerifyInit(long session, CKM mechanism, long key)
      Initialises a verification operation, where the signature is an appendix to the data, and plaintext cannot be recovered from the signature (e.g. DSA).
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      mechanism - the verification mechanism
      key - verification key
      See Also:
      • C.VerifyInit(long, CKM, long)

    • GetFunctionStatus

      public void GetFunctionStatus(long session)
      In previous versions of Cryptoki, C_GetFunctionStatus obtained the status of a function running in parallel with an application. Now, however, C_GetFunctionStatus is a legacy function which should simply return the value CKR_FUNCTION_NOT_PARALLEL.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      See Also:
      • C.GetFunctionStatus(long)
      • NativeProvider.C_GetFunctionStatus(long)

    • CancelFunction

      public void CancelFunction(long session)
      In previous versions of Cryptoki, C_CancelFunction cancelled a function running in parallel with an application. Now, however, C_CancelFunction is a legacy function which should simply return the value CKR_FUNCTION_NOT_PARALLEL.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      See Also:
      • C.GetFunctionStatus(long)
      • NativeProvider.C_GetFunctionStatus(long)
